name: diederikdijkstra
description: Personal website with 11ty, TailwindsCSS and PostCSS.

scripts.start: concurrently "ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy --serve --watch" "ELEVENTY_ENV=development postcss src/_assets/stylesheets/app.pcss -o src/static/app.compiled.css -w" "webpack --watch --config webpack.config.js"
scripts.minify: del dist && ELEVENTY_ENV=production eleventy && ELEVENTY_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build: npm run minify && concurrently "ELEVENTY_ENV=online eleventy --serve" "ELEVENTY_ENV=production postcss src/_assets/stylesheets/app.pcss -o src/static/app.compiled.css -w"
scripts.online: npm run minify && ELEVENTY_ENV=online eleventy && ELEVENTY_ENV=production postcss src/_assets/stylesheets/app.pcss -o src/static/app.compiled.css

author: Diederik Dijkstra
